charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE AND 841(a)(1): Conspiracy with intent to distribute more than 125 grams of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine (2)

charges.charge_disposition: 20 months BOP; 3 yrs. supv. rel. w/conditions; $50.00 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F CONTROLLED SUB-SELL,DISTRIBUTE,OR DISPENSE and 841(a)(1): Conspiracy to distribute more than 10 grams of a mixture and substance containing methamphetamine, a controlled substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed per plea agreement and oral motion/order of 10/05/95

charges.charge_description: 18:924C.F FIREARMS (18 USA 924(c)(1)): Use and carry a firearm during a drug crime (3)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed per plea agreement and oral motion/order of 10/05/95
